content: - 10 single_crochet 9 st for 2 row 9 11 5 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 1sc 9 change color to light pink on the last st 12 4sc flo 5sc blo 9 13 - 29 single_crochet 9 st for 17 row after a few row stuff the foot and add a bit more stuffing to the heel area the heel area is where the blo are give the foot a nice shape after that stuff as you go bit by bit leave 2 row unstuffed 30 add a few single_crochet if needed get to the side of the leg and single_crochet though both sides i do 3sc 1sl st f\o and leave a yarn tail for sewing pictures row 11 where the pins are there should the half_double_crochet go and where the light pink yarn is that is the last st of row 11 and the st in which you should change your color to light pink row 12 4sc flo 5sc blo with light pink yarn ears make 2 light pink 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 2 increase x6 12 3 2sc increase 16 4 - 7 single_crochet 16 st for 4 row 16 8 2sc decrease 12 9 single_crochet 12 st 12 10 2sc decrease 9 11 - 12 single_crochet 9 st for 2 row 9 13 3sc slip_stitch through both sides to close it f\o don t stuff the ears fold them flat leave a yarn tail for sewing eyes make 2 start with black 1 magic_ring with 6 st 6 on the last st before you tighten your magic_ring change the color to white and then tighten the ring 2 1sc increase 9 i do the half color change in this row while doing the increase it means that your bottom loop will be black and your loop on the top will be white so when you go in the st pick up the black color and pull it through your st and now you have 2 loops on your hook the first one is white and the second one is black same as you would do a single_crochet but instead of pulling through the black to make a single_crochet you ll flip the yarns and pick up the white and pull it through your two loops so now again you have 1 loop on your hook white go into the stitch and pick up your black yarn and pull it through the st 2 loops on the hook as for a single_crochet the first one is white the second one is black now flip the yarn and pick up the white and pull through both loops when you get to the first st of the next row just go into the st and make a single_crochet with only the white yarn 3 2sc increase 12 white 4 slip_stitch and f\o leave a yarn tail for sewing the last st in the magic_ring change your color to white before tightening up your magic_ring it should look
